Contact.title: Contacts /
Contact.subTitle: I am Gloria and Life is my best project.

Services.description: Tea, conversation or silence - as you wish. Here you can be yourself.
Services.description_psyh: Życie stawia przed nami trudne pytania. Sometimes the answer is nie jest rada, but the presence is uważna, szczera, nieoceniona. I help you find a connection with yourself, go through pain, uncertainty, fear and fatigue - and come out stronger. Choose the method that corresponds to you. Lub po prostu napisz - a znajdziemy drožu za znadzijemy družu.
